title: Normandy pork casserole with apples, celery and walnuts
ingredients: ['2 tbsp sunflower oil', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) pork fillet (tenderloin), trimmed of fat and cut into cubes', '8 celery sticks, cut across into 5 cm (2 in)lengths, leaves reserved and chopped', '1 onion, roughly chopped', '450 ml (15 fl oz) cider or apple juice', '1 bay leaf', '300 g (10½ oz) long-grain rice', '900 ml (1½ pints) boiling chicken stock', '3 crisp dessert apples, preferably red-skinned', '100 g (3½ oz) broken walnuts', 'salt and pepper']
